message.content:
I need to identify the line item and value of costs incurred to secure customer orders and to deliver goods and services to customers from the financial statement.

Looking at the income statement, the line item related to securing customer orders and delivering goods/services would typically be "Selling Expenses." Selling expenses are costs associated with marketing, sales, distribution, and other activities required to secure orders and deliver products to customers.

In the given income statement, I can see:
```
| Selling Expenses | 1325774.90 | 2024-02-05 |
```

This is the specific line item that represents the costs incurred for securing customer orders and delivering goods and services.

{"solution": {'value': '1325774.90'}}
